product_name: Bike and Road Map of South County, Rhode Island
long_description: Slip this handy map in your pocket for biking adventures throughout southern Rhode Island. Details six great bike loops in Rhode Island's South County. Includes West Greenwich, Coventry, East Greenwich and southeast Connecticut. Durable map paper is waterproof and won't wear out at the folds. Measures 26 x 23 in. open, 6 x 4 in. folded. Copyright 2004, Cliff Vanover.
short_description: Slip this handy map in your pocket for biking adventures throughout southern Rhode Island.
